author: Tayo
text: incompetent customer service
title: incompetent customer service

author: Michael
text:
Your customer service isn’t very good, it takes ages to speak to someone if there’s a problem ie no actual agent to speak to on the phone.   

There’s no delivery options aswell you only seem to deal with UPS and they’re terrible.
title: Your customer service isn’t very good

author: Al
text:
Terrible service. False sizing chart for women's shoes and when raised the customer service team did not care and made it seem like as a gesture of goodwill they will cancel the order - although I purchased based on their incorrect size chart. Go to the brand website to see correct measurements before ordering. They then kept the money for three weeks and after multiple emails gave excuses. 

Would avoid shopping there, better to pay more elsewhere. 
Also - check reviews online people have received fakes because this company don't know how to check the shoes.
title: Avoid

author: Damon
text: Absolutely horrible, as I was sent Womnes sizes and not mens size. I provide proof of a mens actual 12 size compared to order I was sent and not close.  No where on the item or tags didn't it States mens but only womens size. I will NEVER use this site again hopefully no one else will either, as I out of $140 now with wrong order.
title: Absolutely horrible

author: Raul
text: Stockx takes to long to ship orders the next time I order something it’s not going to be from stockx
title: Stockx takes to long to ship orders …

title: I never received my package

text: Nothing about this product was. Nothing. And now I’m stuck with them. FOH

author: Bri
text: Took 3 weeks to get to me.
title: Took 3 weeks to get to me.

text: I am still waiting on my product. This is too slow.

author: XX
text: You said that I can get the product at 21-28 March. Today is 29 of March. I did not get anything!!!!!!!
title: You said that I can get the product at…

author: Shop Elsewhere
text: Liars!!!!! Received an email from StockX confirming shoes had been shipped to them and would be 1-3 days. Now we are over a week since that email and still no shoes have arrived at StockX. Do not trust StockX and buy elsewhere. They also have the worst customer service that replies with very vague  information on your case when you submit one. One pissed off customer!!!!!
title: Liars!!!!

author: Terrance
text: I ordered my shoes March 16..It is March 28th and i haven’t recieved any update whatsoever.smh
title: I ordered my shoes March 16..It is…

author: Tranytte Miller
text: Their shoes are verified fake!!! The Jordans are anyway!!! I bought the jumpman 12 and some places on shoes is missing paint and the sole is supposed to be white but it is a diff white from shoe!!! Last purchase I will ever make with stock!!! Scam artists!!!! If only we could take pictures…
title: Their shoes are verified fake!!

author: Mariajose
text:
Update- 4/1/22 

I was told 3 days ago that I would receive a response in 1-2 days after a “ senior authenticator” looked at my images that I have sent it and still haven’t heard back from them. At this point I am just getting the run around. It’s clear as day that the shoes aren’t authentic ! I’m trying to go about this situation the right way and still have no response from StockX ! Last time I make a purchase through this company. It’s clear that customers aren’t what comes first here . 


Horrible experience !!!
Waiting for a  Representative to email me back In regards to my return. I received a replica pair of Playoff Jordan 12’s. 
I just want my full refund. This is sad, I waited a few weeks for my shoes and I receive a faulty pair.
title: Horrible experience !!!

author: Justin
text: They don't accept returns.
title: They don't accept returns.

author: Mike
text: It is what it is.
title: It is what it is.

author: James
text:
I was super excited to find a pair of sneakers on your website that my daughter wanted more than anything for her 14th birthday.  I knew that the sneakers would need to make their way to your facility for inspection, but tha faze took longer than expected (around a week or better). Finally I heard back from StockX, only to hear that they didn't meet their expectations. Don't get me wrong, that's great that they have pride in their product. My problem was that I dished out almost 200 dollars just to be told I'd see a refund someday. You could have tried harder to get me what I ordered. Now I had to order from overseas and take my chances. 
Sincerely, 
Mr. Tilney
title: I was super excited to find a pair of…

author: Rae
text: StockX sent a pair of shoes with a “verified” tag but they are fake shoes. Stitching is different they even smell fake. Any sneaker head knows what fresh new shoes smell like. They smell fake, like fake jerseys
title: StockX sent a pair of shoes with a…

author: ethan Ciesluk
text: The shipping is horrendous, took over a month when it said way sooner. Also the shipping is 15$…
title: The shipping is terrible
